body: The code here is really tricky on Python 2. It lets English word pass, say `u'hello'`, while all Chinese words are blocked, say `u'你好'`.  The inconsistent result is expected?
body_html: The code here is really tricky on Python 2. It lets English word pass, say u'hello', while all Chinese words are blocked, say u'你好'. The inconsistent result is expected?
